title: New Server
body: Hi im hoping That this dicussion gets to riot i was wandering if maybe u guys could make a server in South Africa Because i get 200-240ms when i play on the closest server Thanks.

replies.body: Mase hits one of the biggest reasons why there aren't servers for everyone, but it also comes down to finding a physical location good enough to house the servers themselves. That can be a really big factor in why there might not be more servers in general.

Is there really enough people that'd play on that server because it's the best connection for them?

You have to remember, let's just say 100k people are on the NA servers, not all 100k are on at a time. If there's only like 5000 people who have an actual reason to play on South Africa servers, you will run into the same people a lot and it's going to be much more difficult to get in games at all since the player base will be more spread thing at some ranks.
